column4: anybody has managed to have ati opengl acceleration with breezy and is able to help me?
what have you done so far? what all have you installed and configured?
check /var/log/Xorg.0.log for DRI errors for more information as to why it's not loading
do an lsmod | grep fglrx, it list anything?
and you're sure you installed the restricted modules of the same version as your kernel?
dmesg | grep fglrx, anything there that looks like an error?
hmm, looks fine except for GLcore, you dont have to load it as DRI should automatically include it
and i'm not sure what i2c is... i don't have that in mine
i dont think it's the problem but who knows... the only suspicious thing i'm seeing so far is in the DRI warnings where it says unknown third-party board...
you could try a "sudo depmod -ae" and then rebooting
rebuilds module dependency cache or something..
